testcase.classname: Validation of OrderId in AdactIn hotel Web Application
testcase.name: TA01_Validation of OrderID in Booking Confirmation Page with valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given User launch AdactIn Hotel Web Application.............................passed Then User verify whether login page is displayed............................passed When User enters valid username and valid password..........................passed And User clicks on Login Button.............................................passed Then User verify Search Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User enters valid location,valid hotels,valid roomtype, valid numberofrooms,valid checkindate,valid checkoutdate, valid adultsperroom,valid childperroom.passed And User clicks on Search Button............................................passed Then User verify Select Hotel page is displayed.............................passed And User clicks on select radio Button......................................passed And User clicks on Continue Button..........................................passed Then User verify Book Hotel Page is displayed...............................passed When User enters valid firstname, valid lastname, valid creditcardnumber, valid creditcardtype, valid expirymonth,valid expiryyear, valid cvvnumber.passed And User clicks on Book now Button..........................................passed Then User verify Booking order page is displayed and OrderId is validated..passed

testcase.classname: Validation of OrderId in AdactIn hotel Web Application
testcase.name: TA02_Validation of OrderID in Booking Confirmation Page with valid inputs
testcase.system-out: Given User launch AdactIn Hotel Web Application.............................passed Then User verify whether login page is displayed............................passed When User enters "aswinprabu9444","aswinprabu9444"..........................passed And User clicks on Login Button.............................................passed Then User verify Search Hotel Page is displayed.............................passed When User enters valid "Adelaide","Hotel Cornice","Super Deluxe","2 - Two","18/12/2021","19/12/2021","4 - Four","3 - Three".passed And User clicks on Search Button............................................passed Then User verify Select Hotel page is displayed.............................passed And User clicks on select radio Button......................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User verify Book Hotel Page is displayed...............................passed When User enters "Karan","Haridoss","Vellore","1234567890123456","Master Card","1","2022","444".passed And User clicks on Book now Button..........................................passed Then User verify Booking order page is displayed and OrderId is validated..passed
